name: QueryPeopleInOrg
description: 对于诸如@EpicGames这样有380,000+人的超大型Org，在people中搜索用户名会卡死，报错timeout，因此只能用爬虫爬下来在本地数据库搜索以找到自己的位置。| For a very large organization such as @epicGames with 380,000+ people, search username will cause timeout error, so have to crawl down to search by local database to find onself's position.
author: GitHub@SynthesisDu
